alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 3:06AM AKST until December 07 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will continue through tonight. The worst conditions are expected this afternoon and evening when south winds gust to 40 mph. Conditions will improve early Thursday as winds decrease.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
